description: artist: Jorge Rivera-Herrans, Luke Holt, Cast of EPIC: The Musical

lyrics.english: Have you forgotten the lessons I taught you?
Athena!
Have you forgotten to turn off your heart?
lyrics.korean: 네 심장에 신경을 끄는 것을 잊었느냐?

lyrics.english: This is not you
I see you changing from how I've designed you
lyrics.korean: 내가 너를 빚은 모습에서 네가 변하는 것이 보인다

lyrics.english: Have you forgotten your purpose?
Let me remind you
Goddess of wisdom, Master of war
My life has one mission
Create the greatest warrior
I had a challenge, a test of skill
A magic boar only the best could kill
lyrics.korean: 가장 뛰어난 자만이 죽일 수 있는 마법의 멧돼지

lyrics.english: One day a boy came for the thrill
lyrics.korean: 어느 날 한 소년이 자극을 찾아 왔다

lyrics.english: A boy whose mind rivaled the boar's own will
lyrics.korean: 멧돼지의 의지에 필적하는 정신을 가진 소년이

lyrics.english: Let's go!
Maybe one day he'll follow me
lyrics.korean: 어느 날 그가 날 따라올지도 모르지

lyrics.english: And we'll make a greater tomorrow, then they'll see
lyrics.korean: 그리고 우린 더 위대한 내일을 만들 것이고, 저들은 보게 되겠지

lyrics.english: I know he'll change the world
lyrics.korean: 나는 그가 세상을 바꿀 것을 알아

lyrics.english: 'Cause he is a warrior of the mind
Maybe one day I'll reach him
lyrics.korean: 어느 날 내가 그에게 다가갈지도 모르지

lyrics.english: And we can build his skills as I teach him
lyrics.korean: 그리고 우린 내가 그를 가르치는 대로 그의 기술을 쌓아올릴 거야

lyrics.english: If there's a problem, he'll have the answer
lyrics.korean: 만약 문제가 있다면, 그는 해답을 가질 거야

lyrics.english: He is a warrior of the mind
Show yourself
I know you're watching me, show yourself
lyrics.korean: 날 지켜보고 있는 것 알아, 모습을 드러내

lyrics.english: I can see you
How can you see through my spell?
lyrics.korean: 어떻게 내 마법을 꿰뚫어볼 수 있지?

lyrics.english: Haha! I was lying, and you fell for my bluff.
Hahahaha!
Well done, enlighten me, what's your name?
lyrics.korean: 잘 했다, 내게 알려다오, 이름이 무엇이냐?

lyrics.english: You first, and maybe I'll do the same
lyrics.korean: 당신 먼저, 그럼 아마 나도 똑같이 하겠지

lyrics.english: Nice try, but two can play this game
lyrics.korean: 좋은 시도였다, 하지만 둘이서 이 게임을 계속할 수 있겠지

lyrics.english: Nah, don't be modest
I know you're a goddess
So let's be honest
You are Athena! (Athena!)
Badass in the arena
Unmatched, witty, and queen of the best strategies we've seen
lyrics.korean: 비할 자 없는, 재치 있는, 우리가 본 가장 뛰어난 전략들의 여왕

lyrics.english: If you're looking for a mentor
I'll make sure your time's well spent
Sounds like a plan, Goddess and man
Bestest of friends
We'll see where it ends.
Okay....
Maybe one day they'll follow me, and we'll
lyrics.korean: 어느 날 저들이 우리를 따라올지도 모르지, 그럼 우린

lyrics.english: Make a greater tomorrow, then they'll see
lyrics.korean: 더 위대한 내일을 만들 것이고, 저들은 보게 되겠지

lyrics.english: I know we'll change the world
lyrics.korean: 나는 우리가 세상을 바꿀 것을 알아

lyrics.english: 'Cause we are the warriors of the mind
Maybe one day we'll reach them
lyrics.korean: 어느 날 우리가 저들에게 다가갈지도 모르지

lyrics.english: And we can build their skills as we teach them
lyrics.korean: 그리고 우린 우리가 저들을 가르치는 대로 저들의 기술을 쌓아올릴 거야

lyrics.english: If there's a problem, we'll have the answer
lyrics.korean: 만약 문제가 있다면, 우린 해답을 가질 거야

lyrics.english: We are the warriors of the mind
I still intend to make sure you don't fall behind
lyrics.korean: 난 여전히 네가 뒤처지지 않도록 확실히 해 줄 생각이다

lyrics.english: Don't forget that you're a warrior of a very special kind
lyrics.korean: 네가 아주 특별한 종류의 전사라는 걸 잊지 말아라

lyrics.english: You are a warrior of the mind
Don't disappoint me

title: Warrior of the Mind
